revised_title: Heterogeneous Barrier Layer Rectifiers: A Comprehensive Study
tldr: This article explores the theory of heterogeneous barrier layer rectifiers, focusing on the diffusion and diode theories. The author presents a model for a barrier with a varying volume density of impurity centers and demonstrates how this model can be applied to a wide range of barrier layers. The study provides a deeper understanding of rectifying junctions and contributes to the development of more efficient rectifiers.
